targets.query:
from(bucket: "benchmarks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "benchmark_result")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg_tps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "benchmarks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "benchmark_result")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg_latency_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "benchmarks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "benchmark_result")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "accuracy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "benchmarks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "benchmark_result")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg_tps" or r["_field"] == "avg_latency_ms" or r["_field"] == "accuracy")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
